resources.string: Which course was there general test failure despite the whole class copying each other?

ELECTRICAL MACHINES 2
 This Course is 3units. It covers Synchronous Machines, Design of Transformers and Rotating Machines, also covers Alternators.
 Lecturer1-Engr Osaretin
Lecturer2-Engr Idiaghe

ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND UTILIZATION
 This Course is 3units. Scope covers Generation of Electrical Energy, its transmission over long distances and finally how it is utilized at the end point.
 Lecturer1-Engr Greg
 Lecturer2-Engr Emmanuel
 Lecturer3-Engr Onwah

ENGINEERING LABORATORY 5
 This Course is 2units. Scope covers basic Experiments in Electrical Electronics both Power and Electronics oriented.
 Lecturer1-Engr Moses
 Lecturer2-Engr Abdul-Rahman
 Lecturer3-Engr Omoze
 Lecturer4-Engr Patrick

CONTROL THEORY
 This course is 3units. Scope covers Introduction to Control Engineering, Stability, Frequency and Time responses, Steady state systems and modelling.
 Lecturer1-Engr Pat
 Lecturer2-Engr Moses
 Lecturer3-Engr Osaze

INSTRUMENTATION
 This course is 3units. Scope covers Measurement and Instrumentation, basic Flow-meters, AC Bridges, Analog/Digital Instrumentation.
 Lecturer1-Engr Emma
 Lecturer2-Engr Moses
 Lecturer3-Engr Ero

CENTER FOR ENTREPRENEURSHIP DEVELOPMENT\n This Course is 2units. Areas covered include Introduction to Business, SWOT analysis, Legalities of Business and General Entrepreneurial topics.\n Lecturer-Dr C.J Mgbame

ELECTRONIC CIRCUITS 1
 This Course is 3units. Scope of course covers Transistors, Filters, Amplifiers and its varieties and general electronic circuits.
 Lecturer1-Engr Bello
 Lecturer2-Engr Akpekpe

TELECOMMUNICATION PRINCIPLES 1
 This Course is 3units. Scope covers Transmission lines, Electromagnetic Propagations, Waveguides and Antennas.
 Lecturer1-Engr Ogbeide 
 Lecturer2-Engr Omoze
 Lecturer3-Engr Otasowie

ENGINEERING MATHEMATICS 5
 This Course is 3units. Scope covers Fourier Series and Fourier Transforms, Probability, Complex Integration and Differentiation and Laplace Transforms.
 Lecturer1-Engr Edosa
 Lecturer2-Engr Eguaile
